name: Jerry Needs The Cheese!
description:
*TURN SOUND DOWN. The game can get loud*

A game based on Tom and Jerry! 

You move Jerry with the WSAD keys.

 Get 15 cheeses and don't let tom catch you!

None of the images used in this game were made by me. I only created the code. These images were found on google and all credit should be given to their respective creators.
